releaseNotes:
v0.6
 - Added Amharic Translations.
 - Added a licence view.
 - Switch to blue accent.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.5
 - Completely removed Google Ads.
 - Fixed some issues on importing strings.
 - Updated build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.4
 - Added Spanish, Russian and Ukrainian translations.
 - Slightly updated app layout.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.3
 - Add info/warning icons to warn illegal characters.
 - Show real-time warning by coloring text into red when a user enters an illegal texts.
 - Allow removing lines by long click.
 - Added option to share exported string.
 - Added Indonesian and Malayalam translations.
 - Improved script view and saving.
 - Highlight matching words when searching.
 - Updated translations.

v0.2
 - Rebuild from nearly scratch.
 - Added Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian) and German translations.
 - A bunch of bug fixes and improvements.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.1
 - Initial release.
